posts.title: Light Up Skateboard Wheels
posts.content: Make your skateboard the center of attention at the park or on the streets with the light up skateboard wheels. Each luminescent wheel comes embedded with a small strip of LED lights so everyone’s eyes will be on you as you skate by, for better or for worse.

posts.title: Misting Dog Leash
posts.content: Keep your fur covered friend nice and cool during the hot summer months with the misting dog leash. Simply fill the ten ounce water bottle attached to the leash and watch as it delivers a gentle misting spray to cool down your dog. A must have for any active dog owner.

posts.title: Baby Nessie Tea Infuser
posts.content: Never drink tea alone again with this baby Nessie tea infuser by your side. Apart from serving as your drinking buddy, baby Nessie’s porous body will release the tea into your mug while his long neck extends above the water’s surface so that you can stir it.

posts.title: Butter Saving Lid
posts.content: Help keep your stick of butter fresh when it’s not in use by placing this butter saving lid over it. These reusable and dishwasher safe caps are made from food safe silicone and offer an eco-friendly alternative to plastic wrap, bags, and foil.

posts.title: Taco Truck Tray
posts.content: Honk, honk! Push that old ice cream truck aside and make way for the taco truck tray. This novelty taco plate allows you to keep two extra hard shell tacos on reserve, so you can binge eat your delicious meal without ever taking a single break.

posts.title: ABC’s Of Men’s Fashion Book
posts.content: Impeccable style doesn’t just happen, it’s something that has to learned from the ABC’s Of Men’s Fashion book. Written by highly esteemed fashion experts, this encyclopedia of style teaches you the ins and outs of men’s fashion so you’re always dressed like a sir.

posts.title: Stuffed Animal Night Light Projectors
posts.content: Make nighttime a little less scary for your little ones with help from these cute stuffed animal night light projectors. Shaped like a cuddly turtle, it comes in three soothing color options and projects a complete starry night sky onto the ceiling and walls.

posts.title: LED Knife
posts.content: Perform bushcraft tasks long after the sun goes down with ease by using this LED knife. Apart from its razor sharp 3.5 inch steel blade, the handle comes lined with small LEDs that shine bright to provide visibility around your work/stabbing area.

posts.title: Magnetic Light Switch Screws
posts.content: Increase the functionality of your home’s light switches using these useful magnetic screws. They come with a magnetized surface that serves as the ideal location for hanging things like your house keys and other metallic knickknacks.

posts.title: Navy SEAL Survival Book
posts.content: Luck is for chumps. Ensure you’re ready when disaster strikes by studying this Navy SEAL survival book. Written by former SEAL and survival expert Cade Courtley, the book shows you step-by-step instructions on how to handle virtually anything.

posts.title: 360 Degree Rotating Clamping Worklight
posts.content: Ensure your work area is properly illuminated when you’re on the job by having this rotating clamping worklight by your side. The head rotates 360 degrees while pivoting 90 degrees so that you can direct the light to precisely where you need it.

posts.title: LEGO Star Wars Sandcrawler
posts.content: Add to your every expanding galaxy of collectibles with the LEGO Star Wars Sandcrawler. Straight from the deserts of Tatooine, this geeky LEGO set includes everything you need to recreate your favorite scenes – including LEGO Jawas and droids.
